titleStmt.title: Hezekiahs recovery. Or, A sermon, shevving what use Hezekiah did, and all should make of their deliverance from sicknesse. First preached, and now published by Robert Harris, pastor of Hanwell
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[obert] Y[oung] for Iohn Bartlet, at the golden Cup in the Goldsmiths Row in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: With an inserted errata leaf. Variant: lacking errata.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
